thread.title: Jemma Lucy makes graphic sex confession as she dishes x-rated details of new romance with Chantelle Connelly
thread.title_full: Jemma Lucy makes graphic sex confession as she dishes x-rated details of new romance with Chantelle Connelly

author: sduff
title: Jemma Lucy makes graphic sex confession as she dishes x-rated details of new romance with Chantelle Connelly
text:
XXX-treme overshare Jemma Lucy makes graphic sex confession as she dishes x-rated details of new romance with Chantelle Connelly 
Now we all know where her mouth has been Revealed Comments REALITY star Jemma Lucy has stunned fans with x-rated confessions about her blossoming relationship with Chantelle Connelly. 
The heavily tattooed 28-year-old has been making no secret of her growing romance with her Geordie Shore lover. Fame Flynet 12 Jemma Lucy (right) has confrimed her romance with Chantelle Connelly 
However it seems no part of their relationship will be kept secret as confessions are coming thick and fast just hours after Jemma partied with Chantelle and her mum . 
Ex on the Beach star Jem took to Instagram Live on Tuesday when her saucy confession was divulged. Related articles AGAINST ALL ODDS Reckon YOU can win big on the Baftas? From La La Land to Manchester By The Sea - these are the latest odds A COLD CASE Here's everything you need to know about TONIGHT'S fascinating Shannon Matthews drama, The Moorside Insania Peter Andre admits he's struggling with sleepless nights as 'naughty' newborn baby Theo keeps him and wife Emily up IT'S BACK ON Pregnant Binky Felstead reveals her baby will only have JP's surname 'when they get married' EAST END TROUBLEMAKER Here's the lowdown on Eastenders latest bad boy Keegan, and Zack Morris who plays him STARRY OVER? Hollyoaks' Harry Thompson heartbroken as Ste Hay rejects marriage and grows closer to ex John Paul McQueen 'BRAVE GIRL' Kieran Hayler takes Princess to hospital to have pins taken out of her broken arm SOAR LIKE AN EAGLE The most dangerous daredevil show on TV has begun - who is favourite to win The Jump 2017? 'Better and warmer' Andrew Marr reveals his devastating stroke made his marriage 'better and warmer' Daddy Bear Stephen Bear dreams of marriage and kids and thinks he'll become a dad next year 'I'M A VIRGIN AGAIN' Gemma Collins reckons her £2,000 'designer' private parts look like 'something out of a movie' SALTWATER SALMON Katie Salmon gets wet and wild in cut out swimsuit as she splashed about on raunchy beach shoot 
As fans tuned into the live stream, Jemma was asked to confirm her romance with Chantelle – to which she replied: Yes, I am going out with Chantelle.” 
She also explained the lovers have been growing closer for the past few weeks, adding: “We have been together for about a month.” Fame Flynet The pair have been quite open about their blossoming romance so far Xposure 12 Public displays of affection have been a regular occurance for Jemma and Chantelle 
However things took a much more explicit turn when a fan asked how far the pair’s sexual relationship had developed and she said: “Yes, I have l***ed out Chantelle.” 
The saucy revelations will no doubt fail to smooth relations between Jemma and fellow ex-reality star Jodie Marsh. 
The glamour model, 38, has been on a collision course with Jem and a host of other TV stars after comparing them to “unpaid porn stars”, and declaring that the public want “classy” celebrities – not people having casual sex on TV. iCelebTV Jemma Lucy recently defended reality stars from Jodie Marsh iCelebTV The TV star went to war with the former glamour model over remarks comparing reality stars to porn stars iCelebTV 12 Ross and Jemma have not appeared on Ex on the Beach together yet 
Jemma – who found fame on Ex On The Beach – hit back at Jodie , ranting on Snapchat, she said: “Hang on a minute, they want something classy? 
“Oh let’s all watch something classy like Jodie Marsh. Look at the state of it! That is not class. 
“How can you slag off reality TV when you come from it? 
“Is this classy? No mate, so f
